An attack that may
cause flinching.
description.crystal:
An attack that may
cause flinching.
description.ruby-sapphire:
A kick that inflicts more
damage on heavier foes.
description.emerald:
A kick that inflicts more
damage on heavier foes.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A low, tripping kick
that inflicts more
damage on heavier
foes.
description.diamond-pearl:
A powerful low kick
that makes the foe
fall over. It inflicts
greater damage on
heavier foes.

that makes the foe

A powerful low kick that makes the target
fall over. It inflicts greater damage on
heavier targets.

A powerful low kick that makes the target

description.x-y:
A powerful low kick that makes the target
fall over. The heavier the target,
the greater the move’s power.

A powerful low kick that makes the target

the greater the move’s power.

description.sword-shield:
A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over.
The heavier the target, the greater the move’s power.

effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the target's weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120.

Target's weight | Power
--------------- | ----:
Up to 10kg      |    20
Up to 25kg      |    40
Up to 50kg      |    60
Up to 100kg     |    80
Up to 200kg     |   100
Above 200kg     |   120
effect.shortEffect: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.
